title: Kaia Gerber is photographed while out on a brunch date with Pete Davidson
text:
Saturday Night Live star Pete Davidson, 25, was pictured enjoying brunch with catwalk star Kaia Gerber, 18, on Wednesday morning.

The model and comedian were spotted enjoying each other's company at a popular brunch restaurant in New York City, with a fan snapping a photo of the meet-up.

The outing came just a few hours after Pete, who split from actress Margaret Qualley a week ago, was photographed walking through a Soho neighborhood, after leaving Gerber's apartment, according to Page Six.

Date? Saturday Night Live star Pete Davidson, 25, was pictured enjoying brunch with catwalk star Kaia Gerber, 18, on Wednesday morning, in a photo shared on Instagram by a fan

For the early afternoon date on Wednesday, Kaia, who's the daughter of legendary supermodel Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber, wore a emerald-green sweater as seen in the fan snap, via People.

The 18-year-old was all smiles in the photo as she checked her phone while engulfed in conversation with the comedian, 25.

Keeping with his unique style, Davidson was decked out in a gray long-sleeved shirt and a plaid pants.

Good spirits: Pete joked around with the fan and her friend for another Instagram photo taken during his brunch date

Thank U, Next: The brunch date came just hours after the Saturday Night Live star was spotted leaving Gerber's apartment in New York City, according to Page Six

Designer threads: The 25-year-old stepped out in a black-on-black Louis Vuitton track jacket, zipped up over a yellow t-shirt with black joggers, featuring checkered stripes down the sides

Celine shades: He completed the look with a black pair of women's Celine sunglasses and some purple and teal New Balance sneakers, as he listened to his AirPods

Hours before the brunch Pete was seen walking around Soho after reportedly leaving Kaia's apartment nearby.

In the photographs, Davidson was sporting a different outfit that consisted of a black-on-black Louis Vuitton track jacket, zipped up over a yellow t-shirt, multi-colored sneakers and Celine sunglasses.

Gerber was later seen keeping an equally low profile when she stepped out of her apartment dressed an over-sized denim jacket over a black hoodie with matching black leggings.

Stepping out: Gerber was seen keeping an equally low profile when she stepped out of her apartment before the brunch

Yankees fan: She sported an oversized denim jacket over a black hoodie with matching black leggings. The look was completed with a blue Yankees baseball cap, black oval sunglasses and a pair of white sneakers, as she carried a black purse

Fashion legacy: Gerber, who turned 18 last month, is the daughter of Rande Gerber and supermodel Cindy Crawford, as well as rising model herself

A source told Page Six that the two are 'just friends' and most likely met in June when Davidson made his runway debut for Alexander Wang, in which Gerber also walked.

Most recently, Davidson had a whirlwind romance with Margaret Qualley, 25, which began in late August. They were spotted at the time holding hands as they strolled through Venice, where Qualley's film Seberg premiered at the Venice Film Festival.

Although Qualley's actress mom Andie MacDowell recently declined to comment on the breakup, she gave Davidson her seal of approval last month.

'She has a beautiful relationship with him but I don’t want to step on her relationship too much. They have a nice relationship,' she told People.

A source told Us Weekly that the former couple have 'remained friends.'

Runway romance: A source told Page Six that the two are 'just friends' and most likely met in June when Davidson made his runway debut for Alexander Wang, in which Gerber also walked

Moving on: Although he and Margaret Qualley ended things last Thursday, a source told Us Weekly: 'They remain friends'

Calling it quits: Before Qualley, the Saturday Night Live star began dating Kate Beckinsale, 46, in late January, calling it quits in April

Before Qualley, the Staten Island, New York native dated Kate Beckinsale, 46, from late January through April.

But his most high-profile relationship was with Ariana Grande, with whom he began dating last May, which resulted in the couple getting engaged the following month.

Their bliss wouldn't last and the couple announced they had split in October. .

During their relationship, Grande wrote a song entitled Pete Davidson for her album Sweetener.

He was also mentioned in the breakup track Thank U, Next from the album of the same name.
description: The chatter of a Kaia Gerber-Pete Davidson fling just stepped up another couple of notches. The rising model and Saturday Night Live star were spotted enjoying each other's company.
